ovdesc.p: This Application is used to generate outward claim files online, by Verifying an appropriate DD.PARAMETER Id.
It has the option of not updating the file which allows a sample view of the contents of the file without actually updating related DD applications.
The list of DD.ITEM which has the status as "NEW.ITEM" or "RESUBMITTED.ITEM" & their underlying DDI's status as "ACTIVE" are picked up during file generation process.
After the file is generated with Update files set to "Y", the individual DD.ITEM record status is set to "CLAIM.SENT" and DD.HEADER is updated with Item details.
Once the Items are included in the File, these items are skipped during the next file generation process.
In case file is not generated during Online process then the claim file gets generated as an End of Day batch process based on the CLAIM.DATE.PRD set in DD.PARAMETER.

desc.p: Identifies the Parameter id for which the file is to be generated online.
Must be a record in DD.PARAMETER Application
Specifies the Id of the DD.GENERATE.FILES record to be verified.
Specifies whether the file generated should be updated and written in the location specified in DD.PARAMETER.. To view a sample file before sending it to the Clearing agency, give the UPDATE.FILES
field as "No". Then a sample file is generated without updating the Item & Header and this can be viewed from Hold control Report.
